name: tooljump-monorepo
description: Connect your dev tools (GitHub, AWS, monitoring, etc.) so knowledge and navigation live where engineers work - no context switching, no tribal knowledge.

scripts.build:extension: cd extension && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build:all: yarn install && lerna run build && yarn build:extension
scripts.dev:extension: cd extension && yarn install && yarn watch
scripts.package:extension: cd extension && yarn install && yarn package
scripts.package:extension:dev: cd extension && yarn install && yarn package:dev
scripts.test: yarn --cwd extension test && lerna run test
scripts.test:cov: yarn --cwd extension test:cov && lerna run test:cov
